description:
The interview was recorded on May 14, 2003 with Bādīʻah Nāyfah, female, born in Qāqūn, Palestine and resides in Burj al-Barājinah (Palestinian refugee camp: Lebanon), Lebanon.

السيرة: سجلت المقابلة مع بديعة نايفة في 14 أيار مايو 2003، أنثى، ولدت في قاقون، فلسطين وتقيم في مخيم برج البراجنة للاجئين الفلسطينيين، لبنان
contents: Socio-economic conditions and wedding celebrations at Qāqūn. (@ 0:03)||Community patterns and mechanisms. (@ 25:2)||Political dynamics at the village during Zionist attack. (@ 41:43)||Political situation and resistance during the Zionist occupation. (@ 57:44)||Expulsion from Palestine (@ 87:29)||The expulsion and socio-economic conditions in Lebanon. (@ 100:12)
